::Windrazor was shaken by Vulois' words.  He had not meant to offend the bot::
Windrazor:  I am sorry, I am a little angry about Soundwave's demise.  I only 
meant that the Alliance will not listen to you.  Soundwave was probably the 
greatest Decepticon ever.  He broke the mold of the cold murderous type that 
too many cons are today.  I wholeheartedly want to help your cause and stop 
this war.  And my men will need some convincing, but soon they will 
understand as well.  If it makes you feel better, Me and my men will single 
handedly convince the alliance to accept your bid.
::He had said his piece, now he just needed an answer: would Vulois accept 
him and put this misunderstanding behind him?  Or would he have to fend for 
himself?
